docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: ⚙️ Salesforce Lightning Web Components (LWC) Setup & Customization Guide
Overview
docs.text: Lightning Web Components (LWC) is a modern framework built on web standards for developing fast, reusable UI components in Salesforce. This guide covers environment setup, creating your first LWC, deploying it, and customizing it with JavaScript and Apex.

docs.title: 1. Prerequisites
docs.text:
Before starting, ensure you have the following tools installed:

Tool Version Purpose Link Salesforce CLI (SFDX) Latest Command-line interface for Salesforce development Download CLI VS Code Latest IDE for Salesforce development Download VS Code Salesforce Extension Pack Latest VS Code extensions for Apex, LWC, and metadata deployment VS Code Marketplace Git Optional Version control Download Git

Salesforce Org Requirements - Developer Edition or Sandbox org. - My Domain enabled. - Lightning Web Components enabled (default in all modern orgs).
